briefTitle: Reduced Dexamethasone Pre-Medication Dose in Elderly Patients Receiving Weekly Docetaxel
officialTitle: Feasibility of A Reduced Dexamethasone Pre-Medication Dose in Elderly Patients Treated With Weekly Docetaxel
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To evaluate the feasibility of a reduced dexamethasone pre-medication dose in elderly lung and breast cancer patients receiving weekly docetaxel therapy with respect to incidence of: Grade 3/4 fluid retention
